author: syawal
content: Not all SSL is the same, SSL (Perfect Forward Secrecy, PFS) is the best available out there at the moment. https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2013/08/pushing-perfect-forward-secrecy-important-web-privacy-protection & https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2013/08/one-key-rule-them-all-threats-against-service-provider-private-encryption-keys
